nRkFg: OUSD/stablecoin exchange rates fluctuate regularly and may change before your transaction is confirmed. As a security precaution, the maximum allowable OUSD/stablecoin redeem rate is 1.00, which means that users will never receive more than one stablecoin for each unit of OUSD.

44Ld5U: The vault is designed to maintain a consistent ratio of various stablecoins. When OUSD is redeemed, stablecoins are withdrawn according to this ratio.
